hero.heading: Emphasize Commitment
hero.subheading: Committed to Supporting the Maritime Industry with Integrity and Expertise
hero.subheadingleft: Supporting maritime industries with reliable energy solutions and operational expertise

aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.description: TMD Energy Limited ('TMDEL') is a prominent integrated marine fuel bunkering service provider operating primarily in Malaysia. As a part of Straits Energy Resources Berhad ('Straits'), a Fortune Southeast Asia 500 company, we leverage a strategic presence in the Straits of Malacca and the South China Sea. With operations spanning multiple ports and a comprehensive fleet, we serve global customers including shipowners, operators, and oil traders.

vission.title: Vision
vission.description: Committed to building a legacy based on trust, excellence and customer satisfaction in every endeavour we undertake.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To uphold the highest standards of operational excellence, safety, and regulatory compliance while building long-term partnerships that drive industry advancement.

image.title: Service Location
image.description: Strategic locations across key maritime regions to serve our clients efficiently and effectively.

image.title: Our Customers
image.description: Serving leading companies in offshore drilling and maritime operations with dedication and excellence.

image.title: Services Overview
image.description: Comprehensive range of maritime and offshore support services tailored to meet industry demands.

highlight.title: Highlights
highlight.description: Discover our latest projects, partnerships, and milestones as we drive forward in the energy industry.

slides.title:

slides.description: Operating across multiple ports with a comprehensive fleet, we deliver exceptional bunkering services to global shipowners, operators, and oil traders.

slides.title:
Strategic Presence in
Key Maritime Routes
slides.description: Leveraging our position in the Straits of Malacca and the South China Sea, TMDEL ensures efficient fuel solutions for the maritime industry.

slides.title: Honored to be part of Straits Energy Resources Berhad Group
slides.description: As part of the Straits Energy Resources Berhad (“Straits”) Group, we take pride in Straits being recognised in the 2024 Fortune Southeast Asia 500 rankings. We remain dedicated to delivering excellence in integrated marine fuel bunkering services across Malaysia.
